Tetrarch Thifiell:
My brother of darkness who just realized the true principles of abyss, I congratulate you on your awakening. You have witnessed the dark fate that our race should bear in the upcoming Chaotic Chronicle. But there's no need to be disappointed or be sorrowful at all. We need to carry out our duty only.
Now I shall present the Mark of Fate to you. This mark is essential for promoting to a higher rank. I guess you'll be even more mature next time I meet you. I hope that Shilen's mercy will cast on you.
